title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Gains 6.3% as Index Trades Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Ethereum (ETH) joined Bitcoin Cash (BCH) as a top performer, rising 1.8% from Monday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2780.05, up 0.4% (+9.87) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Nine of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+6.3%) and ETH (+1.8%).

Laggards: SUI (-2.6%) and HBAR (-2.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading higher with 9 of 20 assets up, led by significant gains in BCH (+6.3%) and ETH (+1.8%).
